vscode-hanzi-counter.counterRegex.description: Regex for matching each type of words or characters to count.

vscode-hanzi-counter.statusBarTemplate.description: A Javascript arrow function that returns text to be shown on the status bar. Valid parameters are keys of `#vscode-hanzi-counter.counterRegex#`.

vscode-hanzi-counter.tooltipTemplate.description: A Javascript arrow function that returns text to be shown on the status bar item's tooltip. Valid parameters are keys of `#vscode-hanzi-counter.counterRegex#`.

vscode-hanzi-counter.clickedTooltipTempl.default:
(word, character, nonascii, utf8_1, utf8_2, utf8_3, utf8_4, han, han_punct)=>{return `|||
|-|-:|
|单词数：|${word}|
|中文字数：|${han}|
|中文字数（含标点）：|${han_punct}|
|非 ASCII 字符数：|${nonascii}|
|UTF-8 大小：|${utf8_1*1+utf8_2*2+utf8_3*3+utf8_4*4}|
|总字符数：|${character}|`;}
vscode-hanzi-counter.clickedTooltipTempl.description: A Javascript arrow function that returns text to be shown on the status bar. Valid parameters are keys of `#vscode-hanzi-counter.counterRegex#`.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
